name: mailchimp
title: Mailchimp
description: Send mass email campaigns from within your workflows. Manage customers, campaigns, lists and more.

addCustomerToCampaign.title: Add Customer Profile to Campaign
addCustomerToCampaign.description: Adds a Customer's Profile to a Campaign

email.description: The email address of the customer (e.g. example@example.com)
email.title: The email address of the customer (e.g. example@example.com)

firstName.description: The first name of the customer (e.g. John)
firstName.title: The first name of the customer (e.g. John) (Optional)

lastName.description: The last name of the customer (e.g. Doe)
lastName.title: The last name of the customer (e.g. Doe) (Optional)

company.description: The company of the customer (e.g. Acme Inc.)
company.title: The company of the customer (e.g. Acme Inc.) (Optional)

language.description: The language of the customer (e.g. en)
language.title: The language of the customer (e.g. en) (Optional)

address1.description: The first line of the address of the customer (e.g. 123 St Marie.)
address1.title: The first line of the address of the customer (e.g. 123 St Marie.) (Optional)

address2.description: The second line of the address of the customer (e.g. Apt. 4B)
address2.title: The second line of the address of the customer (e.g. Apt. 4B) (Optional)

city.description: The city of the customer (e.g. Anytown)
city.title: The city of the customer (e.g. Anytown) (Optional)

state.description: The state or province of the customer (e.g. CA)
state.title: The state or province of the customer (e.g. CA) (Optional)

zip.description: The zip or postal code of the customer (e.g. 12345)
zip.title: The zip or postal code of the customer (e.g. 12345) (Optional)

country.description: The country of the customer (e.g. USA)
country.title: The country of the customer (e.g. USA) (Optional)

phone.description: The phone number of the customer (e.g. 555-1234)
phone.title: The phone number of the customer (e.g. 555-1234) (Optional)

campaignId.description: The ID of the Mailchimp campaign (e.g. f6g7h8i9j0)

sendMassEmailCampaign.title: Mass Mailing of the Campaign
sendMassEmailCampaign.description: Mass Mailing of the Campaign by its IDs

campaignIds.description: The Campaign IDs (Can be either a string with comma-separated IDs)
campaignIds.title: The Campaign IDs (Can be either a string with comma-separated IDs)
The Campaign IDs (Can be either a string with comma-separated IDs)

list_is_active.description: Indicates whether the list is active

use_conversation.description: Indicates whether to use conversation view

inline_css.description: Indicates whether inline CSS is enabled

fb_comments.description: Indicates whether Facebook comments are enabled

opens.description: Indicates whether opens tracking is enabled

html_clicks.description: Indicates whether HTML clicks tracking is enabled

text_clicks.description: Indicates whether text clicks tracking is enabled

goal_tracking.description: Indicates whether goal tracking is enabled

campaign.description: Indicates whether Salesforce campaign tracking is enabled

notes.description: Indicates whether Salesforce notes tracking is enabled
Indicates whether Capsule notes tracking is enabled

hour.description: Hour of the day for sending

weekly_send_day.description: Day of the week for weekly sending

monthly_send_date.description: Date of the month for monthly sending

last_sent.description: Last time the RSS feed was sent

constrain_rss_img.description: Indicates whether to constrain RSS images

reply_email_a.description: Reply-to email address for variation A

reply_email_b.description: Reply-to email address for variation B

image_url.description: URL of the social card image

enabled.description: Indicates whether delivery status tracking is enabled

can_cancel.description: Indicates whether the campaign can be canceled
